description: Retrieve a specific chunk from a knowledge base by document ID and chunk index

inputs.name: document_id
inputs.description: The ID of the document to search in

inputs.name: chunk_index
inputs.description: The index of the chunk to retrieve (0-based)

outputs.name: chunk
outputs.description: The retrieved chunk data including content, metadata, and position information

outputs.name: error
outputs.description: Error message if the operation failed
